message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with advanced features and unparalleled performance. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth $12000. Would you be interested in discussing this further?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value and quality of your product. However, I am looking to stay within a budget of $10000. Would you be able to accommodate this?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. We're willing to negotiate and offer the product at $11000. This still reflects its high value and quality, while accommodating your financial considerations.
